Text: Hope you like this as much as I do. Grab the DVD for yourselves from the web shop! Great memories of a fantastic yet tragic year in MotoGP. RIP Marco Simoncelli - you will be sorely missed by fans worldwide. Many agree Marco was the best thing that came to MotoGP in a long time. I will seed as much as possible until there are a few other seeds, but it may be impossible to seed overnight (European time).
